attributes.action: Government to back the Royal Mail in revolutionising its services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government is slowly destroying the royal mail by removing contracts from them thus making any improvements to the service harder due to lack of funds.  It is an institution and needs government backing to invest in new technologies and its support in allowing the service to thrive not survive.  Especially in the face of harsh competition.  I urge you to save Royal Mail.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=royal+
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
